alert.note: Alert for Cross; Lee; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 12:29AM CDT until November 05 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in eastern Arkansas... St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... South central Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1228 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Patterson to Allendale to near Ulm, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Marianna, Parkin, Madison, Palestine, Village Creek State Park, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Colt, Wheatley, Widener, Moro, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, Brickeys, Fair Oaks, Vanndale and New Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
